title: Al Aziziya Boutique Hotel to host 3rd BigB MeetUp
excerpt: Al Aziziya Boutique Hotel, one of the most iconic hotels in Doha, will host the 3rd BigB MeetUp, a community initiative founded by Bosco Menezes, aiming to inspire, inform, and educate about good deeds through a unique event with special needs speakers.
notes: Publication date not specified; the article focuses on an upcoming event themed 'This Ability' with 4 special needs speakers and local partners.
